name: Secret Vault
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one chamber and up to 10 cu. ft. of goods/caster level
text: This spell functions like secret chest, except it affects a small structure, vault, or oversized chest. Living creatures within a secret vault don't cause the spell to fail. While the vault is stored on the Ethereal Plane, living creatures within the vault don't need to eat, drink, or breathe, but they can't leave the vault except via magic such as plane shift. The vault used as a focus for secret vault must cost at least 25,000 gp, and its replica costs 250 gp. A secret vault has only a 1% cumulative chance per day of becoming irretrievably lost after 360 days.
target_zh: 一间房间与最高10立方呎的货物/施法者等级
text_zh: 此法术同秘藏箱(Secret Chest)般运作，除了此法术影响的是一个小型建筑物、地窖或超大箱子。活物在秘藏窖中不会导致此法术失败。当此地窖安置在灵界时，位于地窖的活物不须饮食、饮水或呼吸，但他们不能离开此地窖，除非透过如异界传送(plane shift)魔法。作为秘藏窖的地窖必须花费至少25000gp，并且它的复制品要花费250gp。一个秘藏窖在360天后，每天增加1%的机率使箱子不可挽回的遗失。
